t24:applications.name: ND_DEAL
t24:applications.t24:allowed-functions: A B C D E H I L P Q R S

t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Indicates the type of NDF Deal
Indicates the fixing method
Counterparty with whom the deal is made
Specifies the Dealer Desk handling the transaction
Position Type
Agreement Type Eg. ISDA, FRABBA, etc.
Indicates the value date of the deal
Indicates if it is a Buy or Sell deal
Indicate the deal currency
Specifies the deal amount
Deal amount-settlement currency with notional rate
Business Day Valuation
Business Day Settlement
Indicates the date the Portfolios will be updated by the event
Fixed rate entered by the user
This defines fixed charge amount to be returned
Interest rate of the settlement currency
The settlement currency's interest basis
Number of days for the fixing PL to amortise
Displays discount PL for the fixed early NDF
Settlement PL after discounting fixed early NDF
PL for the fixed early NDF in local currency
Identifies the beneficiary
Beneficiary Address
Counterparty Correspondent Address
Account number of the Contrepartie at their bank
Receiver Bank No
Intermed Bank No
Intermed Address
Payment Narrative
Narrative to appear on the advice to receive
Indicates that the contract by a netted payment
Indicates the limit that will be updated
Specifies the Category
Indicates Account Officer responsible
The deal amount equivalent in local currency
The settlement amount equivalent in local currency
Allows the user to record any special information
Allows the user to record free text information
Transaction link reference of the contract
Delivery message types generated for this record
Override Carrier
Send Date
Addressee
Send Message?
System generated Delivery ref key
Updated during authorisation
Portfolio Number
Additional information defined locally
Overrides generated by this transaction
The user who last updated the record
Date and time when record was input or authorised
Indicates the User who Authorises the record
Auditor Code
Date and time when record was audited

t24:applications.t24:short-description: Application to input and maintain deal details pertaining to Non Deliverable Forwards.
